titles.title: Fair and Accountable IRS Reviews Act
Fair and Accountable IRS Reviews Act
Fair and Accountable IRS Reviews Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reform certain penalty and interest provisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 44 - 0.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 119-318.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 272.

committee.name: House Ways and Means
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
